name: Covid-19 simulator (Kotaro7)
description:
This is a Covid-19  simulation, you can modify number of people and chances of getting infected and distance to get infected.

Controls:

WASD to move.

Mouse to look around.

Mouse wheel to adjust Time scale.

Escape for options tab.

New update released! 

Update 3.5 just released!

Features of update:

-Added Quality selection.

-Added In-game audio player that plays audio from links.
